name: Pixel Arena (Vincent Li)
description:
A 2D arena local-play fighter with 4 maps and 4 additional arcade game modes. A solo Academic project made for IGME-235 for fall 2020 using JavaScript and PIXI.JS. Players fight to the death in a not so bloody bloodsport to claim bragging rights in being better than the other player in a video game. Ultimately, it was a good learning experience of building a game in JavaScript using a rendering engine. It also gave me some insight on how I would build a platformer in general if I ever so choose to build one. 

I do not own any of the music or SFX used in this game.
